snippet: SILVERMAN--Gilbert. The Board and staff of the American Friends of the Israel Museum and of the Israel Museum, Jerusalem, mourn the death of our dear friend, Gilbert Silverman, husband of our Executive Committee member Lila Silverman. Heartfelt condolences to Lila and the entire family. Stacey Bronfman, President, AFIM Stephen Lash and Judy Steinhardt, Board Co- Chairs, AFIM James S. Snyder, Anne & Jerome Fisher Dir., IM Leah Siegel, Exec Dir., AFIM 1/3
lead_paragraph: SILVERMAN--Gilbert. The Board and staff of the American Friends of the Israel Museum and of the Israel Museum, Jerusalem, mourn the death of our dear friend, Gilbert Silverman, husband of our Executive Committee member Lila Silverman. Heartfelt condolences to Lila and the entire family. Stacey Bronfman, President, AFIM Stephen Lash and Judy Steinhardt, Board Co- Chairs, AFIM James S. Snyder, Anne & Jerome Fisher Dir., IM Leah Siegel, Exec Dir., AFIM 1/3
